Name: Hezrou
DamageResistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

Traits.Name: Magic Resistance
Traits.Content: The hezrou has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

Traits.Name: Stench
Traits.Content: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the hezrouâ€™s stench for 24 hours.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The hezrou makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Claw
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
